entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 2:00 PM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 11 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 23 April 2023
